name: Manually Build 5 REAL .EDU Post Pr8
short_description:
create 10 Profile Backlinks uptu pr 8-9 (select extra 1)
    10 dofollow/nofollow links total (2 links per post)
    All contextual/editorial/natural links
    Up to 10 anchors per URL (important since panda 3.3)
    All posts on authority .edu domains
    All sites on web 2.0 Pr 9
    All .edu and web 2.0 pages created by hand, no software.
    Full reports with direct links to your posts



Wey .edu?
.edu links are easy to find if you like spamming forum profiles, but contextual .edu links are a different ball game, not easy to find at all. The reason they are so rare is that .edu (educational domains) do not usually give access to publishers who are not working for, or a student of, their school/university. Google just loves .edu because these highly trusted sites are usually very careful about who they link to, and often attract links from other highly trusted domain

Why web 2.0?
Web 2.0 has been called everything from a pointless buzzword to the panacea of the
summary: Manually Build 5 REAL .EDU Post Pr8 and 5 web 2.0 upto pr9 sites
